/opt/rocm-7.2.0/lib/llvm/bin/clang++  --offload-arch=gfx1201 --hip-link --rtlib=compiler-rt -unwindlib=libgcc -Xlinker --dependency-file=CMakeFiles/benchmark.dir/link.d CMakeFiles/benchmark.dir/tests/benchmark.cpp.o -o benchmark  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib src/gpu_efit/libgpu_efit.a src/ray_tracing/libray_tracing.a src/common/libcommon.a src/distributed/libdistributed.a /opt/rocm/lib/libamdhip64.so.7.2.70200 /opt/rocm-7.2.0/lib/libamdhip64.so.7.2.70200 src/common/libcommon.a -lgcc -lgcc
